tasks.task: Deploy production infrastructure with Kubernetes orchestration
tasks.requirements: Create comprehensive Kubernetes deployment configuration for production environment. Include auto-scaling, load balancing, health checks, monitoring, and disaster recovery. Support multiple regions and high availability.

tasks.task: Implement global CDN and edge computing for worldwide access
tasks.requirements: Configure global CDN with edge computing capabilities for worldwide ritual submission and validation. Include regional caching, latency optimization, and automatic failover. Support 99.9% uptime across all regions.

tasks.task: Create mobile applications for iOS and Android
tasks.requirements: Develop cross-platform mobile applications using React Native or Flutter. Include ritual submission, validation, community features, and offline capabilities. Support push notifications and real-time updates.

tasks.task: Implement advanced AI orchestration and multi-model collaboration
tasks.requirements: Create advanced AI orchestration service that coordinates multiple AI models for complex ritual validation. Include model selection, consensus mechanisms, and continuous learning. Support dynamic model switching and performance optimization.

tasks.task: Create comprehensive business intelligence and analytics platform
tasks.requirements: Implement comprehensive BI platform with advanced analytics, reporting, and data visualization. Include ritual trends, community engagement metrics, cultural impact assessment, and predictive analytics. Support real-time dashboards and automated insights.

tasks.task: Implement international localization and cultural adaptation
tasks.requirements: Create comprehensive localization service supporting 50+ languages and cultural adaptations. Include automatic translation, cultural context preservation, regional customization, and community-driven localization. Support RTL languages and cultural calendars.

tasks.task: Create advanced ritual marketplace with blockchain economics
tasks.requirements: Implement advanced ritual marketplace with token economics, NFT minting, and decentralized trading. Include ritual tokenization, staking mechanisms, governance tokens, and automated market making. Support cross-chain transactions and DeFi integration.

tasks.task: Implement advanced security with quantum-resistant cryptography
tasks.requirements: Create quantum-resistant cryptographic system for ritual data protection. Include post-quantum algorithms, secure key management, and future-proof encryption. Support quantum key distribution and advanced threat detection.

tasks.task: Create advanced ritual recommendation and discovery engine
tasks.requirements: Implement advanced recommendation engine using deep learning and collaborative filtering. Include personalized ritual suggestions, cultural matching, seasonal recommendations, and community-based discovery. Support multi-modal content and real-time learning.

tasks.task: Implement advanced community governance and voting systems
tasks.requirements: Create advanced governance system with liquid democracy, quadratic voting, and reputation-based decision making. Include proposal creation, voting mechanisms, delegation, and automated execution. Support complex governance scenarios and cultural heritage council elections.

tasks.task: Create advanced ritual visualization and immersive experiences
tasks.requirements: Implement advanced ritual visualization with VR/AR support, 3D modeling, and immersive experiences. Include ritual space mapping, cultural artifact visualization, interactive guides, and multi-sensory experiences. Support haptic feedback and spatial audio.

tasks.task: Implement advanced ritual impact tracking and sustainability metrics
tasks.requirements: Create comprehensive impact tracking system with advanced sustainability metrics and environmental monitoring. Include carbon footprint calculation, ecosystem impact assessment, social impact measurement, and long-term sustainability reporting. Support real-time environmental data integration.

tasks.task: Create advanced ritual education and certification platform
tasks.requirements: Implement comprehensive education platform with interactive courses, certification programs, and cultural competency training. Include gamification, adaptive learning, peer-to-peer education, and cultural heritage preservation training. Support micro-credentials and blockchain-based certifications.

tasks.task: Implement advanced ritual collaboration and co-creation tools
tasks.requirements: Create advanced collaboration tools for ritual co-creation, community discussions, and cultural exchange. Include real-time collaboration, version control, conflict resolution, and community moderation. Support multi-language collaboration and cultural sensitivity training.

tasks.task: Create advanced ritual legacy and cultural heritage preservation system
tasks.requirements: Implement comprehensive legacy preservation system with advanced archiving, digital preservation, and intergenerational knowledge transfer. Include oral history recording, cultural memory banks, AI-powered preservation, and blockchain-based authenticity verification. Support multi-generational storytelling and cultural continuity.

milestones.name: Global Infrastructure
milestones.description: CDN and edge computing for worldwide access

milestones.name: Mobile Applications
milestones.description: Cross-platform mobile apps for ritual submission
